queries.query: select count(1) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute)
select count(1) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and statuscode = 200
select NVL((case when count(1) <> 0 then ROUND(count(case when statuscode = 200 then 1 end)*100/count(1),2) end),0) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute)
select ROUND(avg(rtt),2) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute)
select count(1) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (33)
select count(1) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (33) and statuscode = 200

select NVL((case when count(1) <> 0 then ROUND(count(case when statuscode = 200 then 1 end)*100/count(1),2) end),0) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (33)
select ROUND(avg(rtt),2) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (33)
select count(1) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (50,51)
select count(1) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (50,51) and statuscode = 200

select NVL((case when count(1) <> 0 then ROUND(count(case when statuscode = 200 then 1 end)*100/count(1),2) end),0) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (50,51)
select ROUND(avg(rtt),2) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (50,51)
select count(1) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (40,55)
select count(1) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (40,55) and statuscode = 200

select NVL((case when count(1) <> 0 then ROUND(count(case when statuscode = 200 then 1 end)*100/count(1),2) end),0) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (40,55)
select ROUND(avg(rtt),2) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (40,55)
select count(1) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (39)
select count(1) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (39) and statuscode = 200

select NVL((case when count(1) <> 0 then ROUND(count(case when statuscode = 200 then 1 end)*100/count(1),2) end),0) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (39)
select ROUND(avg(rtt),2) from tblappaudittrail where  createdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and serviceuserid in (39)
select count(1) from smsqueue  where  itrcvdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and sndrcv = 'S'
select count(1) from smsqueue  where  itrcvdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and sndrcv = 'S' and status = 40
select NVL((case when count(1) <> 0 then ROUND(count(case when status = 40 then 1 end)*100/count(1),2) end),0)  from smsqueue  where  itrcvdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and sndrcv = 'S'
select count(1) from smsqueue  where  itrcvdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and sndrcv = 'R'
select count(1) from smsqueue  where  itrcvdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and sndrcv = 'R' and status = 40
select NVL((case when count(1) <> 0 then ROUND(count(case when status = 40 then 1 end)*100/count(1),2) end),0)  from smsqueue  where  itrcvdate >= sysdate - (interval '5' minute) and sndrcv = 'R'
